body_html: Indeed, we should make it clear that dynamic_rnn will not know - at graph build time - the max_time value; that value is a Tensor whose value is tf.shape(inputs)[0] (0 when time_major=True, 1 when time_major=False). PRs to improve the documentation are welcome!
body_text: Indeed, we should make it clear that dynamic_rnn will not know - at graph build time - the max_time value; that value is a Tensor whose value is tf.shape(inputs)[0] (0 when time_major=True, 1 when time_major=False).  PRs to improve the documentation are welcome!
body: Indeed, we should make it clear that dynamic_rnn will not know - at graph build time - the max_time value; that value is a Tensor whose value is tf.shape(inputs)[0] (0 when time_major=True, 1 when time_major=False).  PRs to improve the documentation are welcome!
